data.name: Aquarist - build aquariums, grow fish, develop your business!

About the Game

[url]https://store.steampowered.com/app/1244630/House_Builder/[/url] [url]https://store.steampowered.com/app/781130/Creatura/[/url] [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1430760/extras/restore.gif?t=1659119522[/img] [h2][b]Hard task - high reward [/b][/h2] Running an aquarium shop is a real challenge! Clients will entrust you with difficult tasks you have to cope with. In return, a reward awaits you. Intended for business development - buying new fish, exotic plants, a store or developing skills [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1430760/extras/use_again.gif?t=1659119522[/img] [h2][b]Recycling and ecology [/b][/h2] Every self-respecting entrepreneur cares about his business. Refurbishing and processing aquarium components will save you a lot of time and money and it's good for environment. [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1430760/extras/redesign.gif?t=1659119522[/img] [h2][b]Let your imagination run wild[/b][/h2] Create an aquarium in which each fish will want to live. Thanks to the variety of objects in the game, you can implement even the craziest ideas! A green, blooming oasis or raw, antique busts? The choice is yours. [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1430760/extras/multiple_species.gif?t=1659119522[/img] [h2][b]Underwater dance[/b][/h2] We provide you with many species of fish and freshwater plants. Your task is to create an ecosystem that is balanced and safe for the inhabitants of your aquariums. Remember that a slight deviation from the parameters necessary for the survival of one species may be crucial for the survival of another! [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1430760/extras/run_store.gif?t=1659119522[/img] [h2][b]A broad perspective[/b][/h2] Run your store the best you can! Take care of the exhibition, sell ready-made projects and carry out individual orders. In the heat of your duties, do not forget about your charges - you are responsible for ensuring their safety, health and food. THE PLOT Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behaviour and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Donâ€™t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while you will be able to open an aquarist shop! MAIN FEATURES Set the aquarium of your dreams - plenty of fish, corals, algae and decorations to set up a perfect place for your pupils! Bring it to life - create an ecosystem that is balanced and safe for the inhabitants of your aquariums. A slight deviation from the parameters necessary for the survival of one species may be crucial for the survival of another! Run your shop - Deal with the clients and difficult tasks to develop your aquarist shop. Explore nature - learn more about fish and their behaviour. About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1244630/House_Builder/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/781130/Creatura/

Hard task - high reward

Running an aquarium shop is a real challenge! Clients will entrust you with difficult tasks you have to cope with. In return, a reward awaits you. Intended for business development - buying new fish, exotic plants, a store or developing skills

Recycling and ecology

Every self-respecting entrepreneur cares about his business. Refurbishing and processing aquarium components will save you a lot of time and money and it's good for environment.

Let your imagination run wild

Create an aquarium in which each fish will want to live. Thanks to the variety of objects in the game, you can implement even the craziest ideas! A green, blooming oasis or raw, antique busts? The choice is yours.

Underwater dance

We provide you with many species of fish and freshwater plants. Your task is to create an ecosystem that is balanced and safe for the inhabitants of your aquariums. Remember that a slight deviation from the parameters necessary for the survival of one species may be crucial for the survival of another!

A broad perspective

Run your store the best you can! Take care of the exhibition, sell ready-made projects and carry out individual orders. In the heat of your duties, do not forget about your charges - you are responsible for ensuring their safety, health and food.


THE PLOT

Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behaviour and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Donâ€™t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

MAIN FEATURES

Set the aquarium of your dreams - plenty of fish, corals, algae and decorations to set up a perfect place for your pupils!
Bring it to life - create an ecosystem that is balanced and safe for the inhabitants of your aquariums. A slight deviation from the parameters necessary for the survival of one species may be crucial for the survival of another!
Run your shop - Deal with the clients and difficult tasks to develop your aquarist shop.
Explore nature - learn more about fish and their behaviour.

data.short_description: Get the best aquarium store in town! Create, renew, manage, observe. See if you can create an aquarium empire.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

package_groups.title: Buy Aquarist - build aquariums, grow fish, develop your business!
